purpose: These JSON files demonstrate the expected output format from each pipeline stage when using the Mock adapter. They serve as both documentation and test fixtures for validating pipeline behavior.

fixtures.description: Result from the concision stage showing canonical text and extracted atomic claims with origin spans.
Result from the symbolizer showing symbol assignments, legend, and logical form candidates.
Result from CNF transformation showing the conjunctive normal form representation and transformation steps.
Final FormalizationResult showing all components assembled from the complete pipeline execution.

usage: These fixtures can be used in unit tests to validate that each pipeline stage produces correctly structured output that conforms to the expected schema.
notes: All fixtures use reproducible mode defaults
Origin spans are 0-indexed character offsets into the original text
Provenance records are omitted or null in these simplified examples for clarity
